## Connecting with Me

Interested in working on a collaborative project together, wondering if I still have the code for a past project, or just want to connect? Please contact me via [email](mailto:benjamin.tjepkes+websitecontact@gmail.com) or through my [LinkedIn profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjamintjepkes/) with any inquiries.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| eval: false

# Load the required libraries
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)

# Create a sample data frame
data <- data.frame(
  c1 = c("bar-chart","check","file-code"),
  c2 = c("https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjamintjepkes/",
         "https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjamintjepkes/",
         "https://www.linkedin.com/in/benjamintjepkes/"))

# Create a gt table
tbl <- gt(data)

# Set column labels
tbl <- tbl %>%
  
  gt_theme_nytimes() %>% 
  
  gt_fa_column(c1, height = "40px", palette = "black") %>% 
  
  cols_label(
    c1 = "",
    c2 = "") %>% 
  
  cols_align(
    align = "center",
    columns = c(c1)
  ) %>%

  #   C4 ~ pct(25)

    title = md("**My Online Profiles**")) %>%

  )
```
